text: - My name's Neerav Kingsland.

I'm the head of global
accounts at Anthropic.

Anthropic was founded to
create the world's safest
and most capable large language model.

Claude is our frontier
large language model.

It's state-of-the-art in a
bunch of important features

for enterprises, like
speed, cost, context window,
but we don't think that's enough.
Our true differentiation is safety.

We're thrilled about what
Claude's availability
on Amazon Bedrock can provide
for businesses across the world.

First, you get access to
Anthropic's frontier technology,

which we believe is the
safest AI model out there
for enterprise use cases.

Equally important is you
get AWS's long history
and track record of data security,

so you can feel confident
that your data is being stored
and used in a safe manner.

Anthropic at its core
is a research company

that is trying to create the
safest large language models
in the world, and through Amazon Bedrock,
we have a chance to take that technology,
distribute it to users globally,

and do this in an extremely
safe and data-secure manner.
We're able to achieve this level of safety
through a research breakthrough we had
called Constitutional AI.

One of the great things
about Constitutional AI
is it brings transparency to the values

that are the foundation of
our large language model.
For our constitution,
we actually drew language
from the UN Declaration of Human Rights.
We have great hopes over the coming years
of what AI can do for the world.
